title: (x) Cuba Style - Radio {BJ Harvey}
content:
Hello,   
   
Does any one know what this font is? It's used for headings in a book called "Cuba Style" which can be found on amazon.com.   
   
 ![Font in book called Cuba Style](http://web.archive.org/web/20081001213919im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/12217.gif)   
   
Regards,   
Melinda

 [‹ Wood font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081001213919/http:/www.typophile.com/node/462 "Go to previous forum topic") [Insert witty "name that font" comment here ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081001213919/http:/www.typophile.com/node/338 "Go to next forum topic")
author: melinda
